src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/init.f

00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : Init
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00014 
00015 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00030 
00031  SUBROUTINE Init
00032 
00033 ! Common Variables
00034  USE NTypes,    ONLY : DBL
00035  USE Domain
00036  USE FluidParams
00037  USE LBMParams
00038  USE MPIParams
00039  IMPLICIT NONE
00040 
00041 ! Local Variables
00042  INTEGER :: i, j, m, ie, iw, jn, js, xs, ys
00043  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: R, lapRho_f
00044  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradRhoSqX_f, gradRhoSqY_f
00045  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradRhoXX2_f, gradRhoXY2_f, gradRhoYX2_f, gradRhoYY2_f
00046 
00047 ! Initialize counters
00048  iStep = 0
00049  tCall = 1
00050  eps   = 1.0D0
00051 
00052 ! Set vtk limits
00053  NX = xu - xl + 1
00054  NY = yu - yl + 1
00055  NX_f = xu_f - xl_f + 1
00056  NY_f = yu_f - yl_f + 1
00057 
00058 !---------Near neighbors in the order parameter mesh ---------------------------
00059  DO j = ylg2_f, yug2_f
00060    DO i = xlg2_f, xug2_f
00061       ni_f(i,j,1) = i + 1
00062       ni_f(i,j,2) = j + 1
00063       ni_f(i,j,3) = i - 1
00064       ni_f(i,j,4) = j - 1
00065    END DO
00066  END DO
00067 
00068 !---------Near neighbors in the momentum mesh ----------------------------------
00069  DO j = ylg, yug
00070    DO i = xlg, xug
00071      ni(i,j,1) = i + 1
00072      ni(i,j,2) = j + 1
00073      ni(i,j,3) = i - 1
00074      ni(i,j,4) = j - 1
00075    END DO
00076  END DO
00077 
00078 
00079 ! Initialize density for order parameter (rhoH assigned to continuous phase)
00080  DO j = ylg3_f, yug3_f
00081    DO i = xlg3_f, xug3_f
00082 
00083      rho_f(i,j) = rhoH
00084 
00085      DO m = 1, nBubbles
00086        R =  DSQRT( ( DBLE(i)-bubbles(m,1) )**2 + ( DBLE(j)-bubbles(m,2) )**2 )
00087        IF ( R <= (DBLE(bubbles(m,3)) + IntWidth) ) THEN
00088           rho_f(i,j) = rhoStar - 0.5*(rhoH - rhoL)*TANH( 2.D0*( DBLE(bubbles(m,3)) - R )/IntWidth )
00089        END IF
00090      END DO
00091 
00092    END DO
00093  END DO
00094 
00095 ! Initialize velocity, pressure and distribution function for order parameter
00096  DO j = ylg_f, yug_f
00097    DO i = xlg_f, xug_f
00098 
00099      u_f(i,j,1) = 0.D0
00100      u_f(i,j,2) = 0.D0
00101      p_f(i,j)   = 1.D0
00102 
00103      f(i,j,0  ) = W0*rho_f(i,j)
00104      f(i,j,1:4) = W1*rho_f(i,j)
00105      f(i,j,5:8) = W2*rho_f(i,j)
00106 
00107    END DO
00108  END DO
00109 
00110 ! Initialization for velocity, pressure, density and distribution function
00111 ! in the momentum grid
00112  DO j = ylg, yug
00113    DO i = xlg, xug
00114 
00115      xs = 2*i - 1
00116      ys = 2*j - 1
00117      rho(i,j) = rho_f(xs,ys)
00118 
00119      u(i,j,1) = 0.D0
00120      u(i,j,2) = 0.D0
00121      p(i,j)   = 1.D0
00122 
00123      g(i,j,0  ) = W0C
00124      g(i,j,1:4) = W1C
00125      g(i,j,5:8) = W2C
00126 
00127    END DO
00128  END DO
00129 
00130 
00131 !-------- Differential terms for stress formulation of interfacial force -------
00132  DO j = ylg2_f, yug2_f
00133    DO i = xlg2_f, xug2_f 
00134 
00135 ! Identify first neighbors
00136      ie = ni_f(i,j,1)
00137      jn = ni_f(i,j,2)
00138      iw = ni_f(i,j,3)
00139      js = ni_f(i,j,4)
00140 
00141 ! Laplacian of the density rho
00142      lapRho_f = 4.D0*( rho_f(ie,j ) + rho_f(iw,j ) + rho_f(i ,jn)            &
00143               + rho_f(i ,js) ) +  rho_f(ie,jn) + rho_f(ie,js) + rho_f(iw,jn) &
00144               + rho_f(iw,js) - 20.D0*rho_f(i,j)
00145 
00146 ! Define Psi
00147      psi_f(i,j) = beta4*( rho_f(i,j) - rhoStar )*( rho_f(i,j) - rhoL )*( rho_f(i,j) - rhoH ) &
00148                 - kappa_6*lapRho_f
00149    END DO
00150  END DO
00151 
00152 !-------- Differential terms for potential formulation of interfacial force ----
00153  DO j = ylg_f, yug_f
00154    DO i = xlg_f, xug_f
00155 
00156 ! Identify first neighbors
00157      ie = ni_f(i,j,1)
00158      jn = ni_f(i,j,2)
00159      iw = ni_f(i,j,3)
00160      js = ni_f(i,j,4)
00161 
00162 ! Gradient of the density rho
00163      gradRhoX_f(i,j) = ( 4.D0*( rho_f(ie,j ) - rho_f(iw,j ) ) + rho_f(ie,jn) &
00164                      - rho_f(iw,jn) + rho_f(ie,js) - rho_f(iw,js) )*inv12
00165 
00166      gradRhoY_f(i,j) = ( 4.D0*( rho_f(i ,jn) - rho_f(i ,js) ) + rho_f(ie,jn) &
00167                      - rho_f(ie,js) + rho_f(iw,jn) - rho_f(iw,js) )*inv12
00168 
00169 ! Square of the density gradient (components and full)
00170      gradRhoXX_f(i,j) = gradRhoX_f(i,j)*gradRhoX_f(i,j)
00171      gradRhoXY_f(i,j) = gradRhoX_f(i,j)*gradRhoY_f(i,j)
00172      gradRhoYY_f(i,j) = gradRhoY_f(i,j)*gradRhoY_f(i,j)
00173      gradRhoSq_f(i,j) = gradRhoXX_f(i,j) + gradRhoYY_f(i,j)
00174 
00175    END DO
00176  END DO
00177 
00178 !-------- Interpolate differential terms in the momentum mesh ------------------
00179  DO j = yl, yu
00180    DO i = xl, xu
00181 
00182 ! Define the relative positions of the source nodes
00183      xs = 2*i - 1
00184      ys = 2*j - 1
00185 
00186 ! Identify first neighbors
00187      ie = ni_f(xs,ys,1)
00188      jn = ni_f(xs,ys,2)
00189      iw = ni_f(xs,ys,3)
00190      js = ni_f(xs,ys,4)
00191 
00192 ! Gradient of the square of the density gradient
00193      gradRhoSqX_f = ( 4.D0*( gradRhoSq_f(ie,ys) - gradRhoSq_f(iw,ys) ) &
00194                   + gradRhoSq_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoSq_f(iw,js)            &
00195                   + gradRhoSq_f(ie,js) - gradRhoSq_f(iw,jn) )*inv12
00196 
00197      gradRhoSqY_f = ( 4.D0*( gradRhoSq_f(xs,jn) - gradRhoSq_f(xs,js) ) &
00198                   + gradRhoSq_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoSq_f(iw,js)            &
00199                   + gradRhoSq_f(iw,jn) - gradRhoSq_f(ie,js) )*inv12
00200 
00201 ! Second derivatives of rho
00202      gradRhoXX2_f = 4.D0*( gradRhoXX_f(ie,ys) - gradRhoXX_f(iw,ys) ) &
00203                   + gradRhoXX_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoXX_f(iw,js)          &
00204                   + gradRhoXX_f(ie,js) - gradRhoXX_f(iw,jn)
00205 
00206      gradRhoXY2_f = 4.D0*( gradRhoXY_f(xs,jn) - gradRhoXY_f(xs,js) ) &
00207                   + gradRhoXY_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoXY_f(iw,js)          &
00208                   + gradRhoXY_f(iw,jn) - gradRhoXY_f(ie,js)
00209 
00210      gradRhoYX2_f = 4.D0*( gradRhoXY_f(ie,ys) - gradRhoXY_f(iw,ys) ) &
00211                   + gradRhoXY_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoXY_f(iw,js)          &
00212                   + gradRhoXY_f(ie,js) - gradRhoXY_f(iw,jn)
00213 
00214      gradRhoYY2_f = 4.D0*( gradRhoYY_f(xs,jn) - gradRhoYY_f(xs,js) ) &
00215                   + gradRhoYY_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoYY_f(iw,js)          &
00216                   + gradRhoYY_f(iw,jn) - gradRhoYY_f(ie,js)
00217 
00218 ! Arrays necessary in preStream and postStream
00219      GX(i,j) = kappaEf*( gradRhoSqX_f - gradRhoXX2_f - gradRhoXY2_f )
00220      GY(i,j) = kappaEf*( gradRhoSqY_f - gradRhoYX2_f - gradRhoYY2_f )
00221 
00222 ! Copy values of the gradient of rho from the overlapping f-mesh nodes
00223      gradRhoX(i,j) = 2.D0*gradRhoX_f(xs,ys)
00224      gradRhoY(i,j) = 2.D0*gradRhoY_f(xs,ys)
00225 
00226    END DO
00227  END DO
00228 
00229 ! Make sure all ghost layers are available in the momentum grid
00230  CALL MPI_UpdateRhoG
00231 
00232 ! Save initial data to file
00233  CALL Stats
00234  CALL VtkPlane
00235 
00236  RETURN
00237  END SUBROUTINE Init
00238
Generated on Sun Jun 15 17:06:04 2008 for LL-2D-DGR-MPI by  1.5.6
